PrintDriver Class Reference

low level drawing function for primitives to draw to the printer More...

#include <printer.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

low level drawing function for primitives to draw to the printer

it is derived from wxPrintout as well as the drawdriver. And therefore the mediator between the internal database and the printer device see for more info related types.

See also:
WindowsDriver
